channel.title: Changing names from npc's in your own client and the examine!

item.title: Changing names from npc's in your own client and the examine!
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

This TUT is going about changing the name and the examine of an npc on your client. If you wan’t to do this you need to go to class.5 in your client map.
When you opened it you need to scroll down until you see this:

if(i == 51) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; byte byte6 = 6; class5.anIntArray76 = new int[byte6]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[byte6]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 2469; class5.anIntArray70[0] = 40; class5.anIntArray76[1] = 2588; class5.anIntArray70[1] = 35; class5.anIntArray76[2] = 910; class5.anIntArray70[2] = 15; class5.anIntArray76[3] = 912; class5.anIntArray70[3] = 20; class5.anIntArray76[4] = 1938; class5.anIntArray70[4] = 25; class5.anIntArray76[5] = 1814; class5.anIntArray70[5] = 30; class5.aString65 = "Baby Black Dragon"; class5.anInt61 = 83; class5.aByteArray89 = "Young but still dangerous.".getBytes(); class5.anIntArray94 = new int[4]; class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10012; class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10013; class5.anIntArray94[2] = 10014; class5.anIntArray94[3] = 10015; }
anything like that. Now you need to add this (if you wan’t to change the name and examine of a npc in your server like (Hans) you can change him name into everything you wan’t! Add this after a }

if(i == NPCID) { class5.aString65 = "NPCname"; class5.aByteArray89 = "EXAMINE.".getBytes(); }
The NPCID is the place where the npc id comes and the NPCname is the name of the npc where you wan’t to change into. And the EXAMINE is the examine option. So if you change examine into hey and you examine your npc in game it says hey. Save compile and you are done!
If you got any problems then you can always question it!
